description:
Embarrassing tech fails, from Mcdonalds, to Tesla, to the global IT crisis...it gets bad. Check out Bitdefender here!  https://bitdefend.me/SCBoss. (Scam Copilot is included in Bitdefender Premium Security and superior plans)
For the next (MOST AWKWARD) Tech Fails: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ay9RL5YQViA&list=PLflqtq8EOGAKyBKc12n4dPiIAex5n4NgC

I spend a LOT of time trying to make my videos as concise, polished and useful as possible for you - if you would like to support me on that mission then consider subscribing to the channel - you'd make my day 😁
